page.title: 18Bus Services
page.content:
{Happy Days}run a coach service to {Newport }on {Wednesdays and Fridays leaving Tibberton at 9.25 a.m. and returning at l2.l5p.m.{Butters Coaches run a service to{Wellington}on {Thursdays and Saturdays}picking up in Tibberton at 9.30a.m. and returning from Wellington at l2 noon.
The{fare for Newport}is 45p each way and there are{reduced rates}for old age pensioners. For{Wellington}the fare is l5p each way for children and 25p for adults.
{Tellus}also run a service to {Newport}on weekdays leaving at 8.00am and returning at 5.00pm. This service is mainly for{schools,}and is taken off in school holidays, but anyone can use it. .
